ygData.subject: Re: gforce 2
ygData.msgSnippet: ... older ... they ... look at ... one and ... market. I put in a Geforce 2TI 64 meg card for the SOL upgrade.  I found it to be a big improvement over my
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@y..., "Su" <suceress@k...> wrote:
>
> True. AGP is faster.
> although some computers may not have a free AGP slot. I know some
older
> versions of compaqs had the vid cards built on to the AGP slot and
they
> could not be removed without risking damage to the motherboard.
> And waiting for GeForce 4 to come out is definetly a good idea.
> luv,
> -Su
>
> > If your looking at buying a new graphics board you should *not*
look at
> pci
> > boards. AGP offers a lot of speed advantages, stick with your old
one and
> as
> > Laine says, the prices will drop when Geoforce4 will hit the
market.

I put in a Geforce 2TI 64 meg card for the SOL upgrade. I found it
to be a big improvement over my Geforce 256. I'm looking at getting
a Geforce 4 in the summer.

And PCI cards are getting hard to find. You should look online, like
Yahoo shopping, and see what's out there.

Tul
